uk.co.dancowan.robots.hal.core.commands
Class AbstractCommand

java.lang.Object
  uk.co.dancowan.robots.hal.core.commands.AbstractCommand
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<Command>, Command
Direct Known Subclasses:
SendString
public abstract class AbstractCommand
extends java.lang.Object
implements Command, java.lang.Comparable<Command>

Base class for Commands.

Implements numerous helper methods.

Extending classes should...

Since:
version 1.0.0
Author:
Dan Cowan

AbstractCommand

public AbstractCommand(boolean isInteruptable)
C'tor

Parameters:
isInteruptable - boolean

AbstractCommand

public AbstractCommand()
C'tor

Default command is not interruptable. Equivalent to:

    new AbstractCommand(-1, false)

Command expects to terminate reading a new line character.

AbstractCommand

public AbstractCommand(int expectedLength)
C'tor

Default command is not interruptable. Equivalent to:

    new AbstractCommand(len, false)

Command expects to terminate reading configured number of characters.

Parameters:
expectedLineLength - the number of characters to read as a response
Method Detail

addListener

public void addListener(CommandListener listener)
Adds the passed listener to the collection of listeners to be notified of command events.

Specified by:
addListener in interface Command
Parameters:
listener - CommandListener instance
See Also:
Command

removeListener

public void removeListener(CommandListener listener)
Removes the passed listener from the collection of listeners to be notified of command events.

Listener is added to a list for removal outside of listener iteration to avoid a ConcurrentModificationException being thrown if the listener needs to remove itself during an event.

Specified by:
removeListener in interface Command
Parameters:
listener - CommandListener instance
See Also:
Command

execute

public void execute(CommandQ cmdQ)
Called by the CommandQ instance to request this command to perform its action.

Implement read() and write() methods to read and write the command essentials to the robot. Fires execute and completion events to all listeners.

Specified by:
execute in interface Command
Parameters:
CommandQ - the CommandQ instance

getCommandString

protected abstract java.lang.String getCommandString()
Callback for implementations to provide the command string to execute.

Returns:
String the command to execute.

failed

public void failed(java.lang.String reason)
Called to announce this command failed.

Override to add additional action on failure. Default implementation fires a commandFailed event to listeners.

Specified by:
failed in interface Command
Parameters:
reason - String, the reason for the failure
See Also:
Command

getPriority

public int getPriority()
Default implementation returns a priority of 100.

Override to return a different priority.

Specified by:
getPriority in interface Command
Returns:
int, the priority of this Command

compareTo

public int compareTo(Command cmd)
Implementation of Comparable interface.

Allows commands to move up the command queue.
